name: Judgment Internship
description:
You are an angel trainee tasked to judge if mortals were guilty or not of the sins they have been accused of during their life. It can be theft, kidnapping or even murder.
To put it in a nutshell, you decide if you send them to paradise or hell.

This is the game we made for the Community Game Jam 2019. The theme was "The game is a liar".
Code: Eximir
Art: Pikatchoum

// Please avoid mashing buttons the game is sensible !
